definition: plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

sentences.english: Amon was twenty and two years old when he began to reign, and he reigned two years in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 亚们登基的时候年二十二岁，在耶路撒冷作王二年。

sentences.english: He was buried in his grave in the garden of Uzza.
sentences.chinese: 亚们葬在乌撒的园内自己的坟墓里。

sentences.english: Amon's officials conspired against him and assassinated the king in his palace.
sentences.chinese: 亚们王的臣仆背叛他，在宫里杀了他。

sentences.english: As for the other events of Amon's reign, and what he did, are they not written in the book of the annals of the kings of Judah?
sentences.chinese: 亚们其余所行的事都写在犹大列王记上。

sentences.english: Amon was twenty-two years old when he became king, and he reigned in Jerusalem two years.
sentences.chinese: 亚们登基的时候年二十二岁，在耶路撒冷作王二年。

sentences.english: Amon was two and twenty years old when he began to reign, and reigned two years in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 亚们登基的时候年二十二岁，在耶路撒冷作王二年。

definition: Zadok (son of Azor and father of Achim in Matthew 1:13)
Ahab (9th c. BC), King of Israel, son of Omri and husband of Jezebel, prominent figure in 1 Kings 16-22
Jehu (842-815 BC), Israelite king, prominent character in 2 Kings 9:10
(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4] Croatia
abbr. for 俄狄浦斯期[e2 di2 pu3 si1 qi1], oedipal phase
Josiah or Yoshiyahu (649-609 BC), a king of Judah (Judaism)
Kagen or the Origin of Value by MIURA Baien 三浦梅園|三浦梅园[San1 pu3 Mei2 yuan2], pioneering study of economics comparable to Adam Smith's The Wealth of Nations 國富論|国富论[Guo2 fu4 lun4]
